flowRoot.flowPara: This is a game for 3-10 people. It's designed to increase awareness about implicit and explicit social rules, see how changing the rules affect the social dynamics, and have fun while doing so!
Basic idea is: 1) Pick any social situation
2) Discover rules people follow in this situation
3) Apply rule modifiers to see how the situation evolves
Modifiers are divided to 3 gategories. Subtle modifiers are used first and stronger modifiers as the game progresses.
The deck contains 3 play modes. The colored corners on the modifier cards tell which modes they belong to.
It's normal that the social situation disintegrates during the game. The main content is the discussion between rounds and after the game.

text.tspan: Any questions, suggestions and observations, please contact:
